summary: TAILGATE ON MY CAR DOES NOT OPEN ALL THE WAY UP LIKE IT USED TO, SOMETIMES WHEN IT STOPS AND SOMEONE TRIES TO REACH INSIDE IT CLOSES BY ITSELF, THIS HAPPENED WHEN MY WIFE WAS TRYING TO TAKE SOMETHING OUT OF THE TRUNK. IF I DID NOT GRAB THE TAILGATE AND STOP IT  COULD CRUSH MY WIFE'S HANDS. CALLED AUDI TO ASK IF THERE IS A RECALL FOR SOMETHING LIKE THAT, THEY TOLD ME THAT THERE IS NONE.   *TR
